description:
It`s time for Kuro`s checkup. As his doctor, Ramune determines that Kuro has made a complete recovery from his mysterious illness.
Since Kuro became Ramune`s assistant while receiving treatment, he asks if this means he should stop coming to the clinic.
Though Ramune wants Kuro to stay, he recalls Momiji`s warning that he`ll make the people around him unhappy, and tells Kuro that he doesn`t have to force himself to come anymore.
Source: crunchyroll
